message:
SYSTEM: StepByStepSample.pdf: Página 2 ○ Annotate my interests (foaf:interest) ○ Annotate my Email (foaf:mbox, schema:email) ○ Annotate my Phone number (foaf:phone, schema:telephone) ○ Annotate my web page (foaf:homepage, schema:url) ○ Annotate my image (foaf:img, schema:img) ○ Annotate the people I know (this is optional, as not everybody has the people they know in their web pages). (foaf:knows, schema:knows) ○ ETC. Example: 1) The vocabulary we are going to use mainly is foaf. therefore we can declare it in order to simplify things:

Daniel Garijo,
Email: alice@example.com,
Phone: +1 617.555.7332.

My buddies:

  • Bob
<---- En vez de anotarme a mí, anoto quién ha hecho la página.

Creado por Dani

... Annotating more than one type with vocabularies: ...
speaker: SYSTEM
